cause.description:
As people constantly invite you to causes, you think they're just a waste of time and they're forcing you to choose a cause to waste space on you profile which could be used by that potential friend, I know it irratates you, so lets stop this cause inviting, cause it's a cause of irritation.
Any donation is much appreciated, as proceeds do go to an official and authorised beneficiary which is a foundation for peace.
1. An end to causing causes
cause.mission: Stop people from bugging you from causes
cause.name: Stop Inviting me to causes
